New Records: Jeffrey Vandersay claimed the seventh-best figures for a Sri Lankan bowler in ODIs
Key Match Events: Jeffrey Vandersay dismissed key Indian batters including Rohit Sharma, Shubman Gill, Shivam Dube, Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, and KL Rahul
Vandersay's six-wicket haul led Sri Lanka to a 32-run victory over India in the second ODI
Post-Match Reflections: Jeffrey Vandersay credited his teammates for laying the foundation for his success
Vandersay acknowledged the pressure of replacing a key player like Wanindu Hasaranga and focused on sticking to the basics and maintaining a good line and length
